June 14, 1906 -8-                                               B.172 - '06 


                                          Sanitarium, California, June 14,'06 

Dr. David Paulson and Elder W.S. Sadler 

Dear Brethren:- 


     I have been working hard, and am weary, and yet I will not give up, for 
                                                                           33
there is much to do. During the dedication of the Loma Linda Sanitarium, I spoke for a short time on the open platform on the lawn, while the wind was blowing. The exercises were very impressive. We also had an excellent meeting at the dedication of the Paradise Valley Sanitarium.
